events.message: I ordered a package over two weeks ago and it still hasn’t arrived. The tracking has not updated for days and I’m worried there’s a delay with the shipping.
The issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay based on mentions of delay and tracking concerns by the customer.
The case has been assigned to a delivery support agent specialized in shipment tracking issues.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your package hasn’t arrived yet, and I’m here to help you track it down.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can look into the tracking details for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 123 Elm Street, Springfield, IL.
I checked your shipment and it appears there was a delay due to weather issues in the transit area. The package is expected to be delivered within the next three business days.
Thanks for the update. I understand the delay is out of your control, but I hope it arrives soon.
We’ve confirmed your package has now shipped out and is on the way. You should receive it within two days. Please do let us know if there’s any further issue.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your package. Please let us know if everything arrived as expected or if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the package yesterday. Thank you for your help and timely updates during the delay.
The case has been closed as the delivery issue is resolved and the customer confirmed receipt of the package.
